attributes.title: Worst app ever .
attributes.review: This is a really bad app I hate it , it took so long to download and it was to slow and had so many glitches and bugs and the quality is just terrible I really want this app off the AppStore it gives terrible experience 😒.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Lags my iPad, designed to give migraines due to it horrible layout, took 3 attempts to just download, and brought to me by the worst president and his cultist in history. The only thing this app does right is spreading stupidity to the ignorant masses. If I could give it 0 stars, I absolutely would.

attributes.title: I am disappointed 😡
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to connect with my fellow imbeciles 💩and learn about all the transphobic, homophobic, and racist things our terrible president 🍊 does to our country. When I opened the app I went into cardiac arrest 🥶and I was diagnosed with stage 3 liver cancer🤩. I do not suggest this app for my fellow clowns 🤡.

attributes.title: do not download if you are planing to
attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded the app my phone flicked and now i can not open any social media apps i had to redownload them and i lost all of my data. i also have gotten a total of 13 viruses in just ten minutes! do NOT download! WORST APP EVER

attributes.title: Don’t
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app it took like around an hour and a half and once i I opened it it was all going fine until it glitched out and it started to make my phone go hot and my phone never does that which confused me.

attributes.title: DISGUSTANG🤮🟠🤮🟠🤮
attributes.review: I got this app to feel like I have a part in helping our country, because I love Cheetos so why not. However, right when I downloaded it, military men in trump masks broke into my room and stone my left kidney! So yeah, if you feel like you want to keep your kidney this app is not for you. 🧚🏻‍♀️🦋💞🍒🎀🌈🥰

attributes.title: Oh to see without my eyes ❌👄❌
attributes.review:
Gotta keep an eye out for Selener 👁 👄➖
This app has ruined my life. I have been kicked out of my house. My dog just died of cancer and my mother stood over his dead body saying “this is because of the trump app!” Needless to say I’m now homeless with a dead dog and a trump 2020 sign to give me shelter. Thanks Donald Trump.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: i originally downloaded this app to support my fellow president trump but instead the app was so infuriating just to see his face on the screen made me puke aggressively and i had to be taken to the hospital. i had severe throat damage from the puke and i’m still recovering. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP !! or you will get throat damage simple.

attributes.title: Please Do Not Download
attributes.review: After entering my cell and email on the get started page, my iphone turned off on it’s own. Now every time I open the app my phone shuts off!! This is making it hard to keep up with his campaign!

attributes.title: No one special
attributes.review: This app is horrible DO NOT DOWNLOAD!! As soon as I downloaded it the app was lagging horribly and no a week after it completely made my phone glitch and lag. I advise you to not get this app I even had to buy a new phone. Makes sense a bad app for a bad president!!🤢
